attributes.action: cease talks and cooperation with the US on UK participation in the US anti-ballistic missile defence scheme.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned demand that the Prime Minister immediately ceases any present or future UK involvement in the US "Son of Star-Wars" anti-ballistic missile defence scheme, and to guarantee that the UK will not house any US missile-interceptors.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
